name: Fling! Smash! (Smash!?)
description:
Have you ever played Super Smash Bros.?

Yes? Awesome we're half way there!

How about FlingSmash!?! No??? 

Well I have and it lead me to dream up this dumb little crossover lol. I hope you can find fun in it :)

I made all of the smash character pixelart for this :0 It took a bunch of work but I'm mostly happy with them. You can download individual sprites from my Deviantart: https://www.deviantart.com/outerrim
or them all at once from this link: https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/folders/1cCwIfBDyjbsVLhWdwEei_F2khYcUT39Q

I also did all the code!!! It was made in LibGDX which is a super cool game framework you should try out if you haven't already :)
My code can be found at this repository and will update as I remember to push to it (might not be frequent lol): https://github.com/seanlindell/FSS

Everything else is blatantly stolen!!! I'll at least give credit though!

Music is from here:  

SFX are from here (rip from SSBU): https://www.sounds-resource.com/nintendo_switch/supersmashbrosultimate/

and the hand/bullet sprites are from here (rip from Kirby and the Amazing Mirror): https://www.spriters-resource.com/game_boy_advance/kirbyandtheamazingmirror/shee...

I also did not make super smash brothers or any of the characters in it (I wish I did though that would be super cool :) )

I'll also plug my website where you can use the sprites to generate smash tournament results graphics :0 :0 :0 : https://www.smashpixelresults.com/

If you wanna use anything I made here for anything feel free! Just please lmk since I'd love to see what you make :)
